title: Apicurio Prompt Template
description: Schema for PROMPT_TEMPLATE artifacts in Apicurio Registry. Defines prompt templates with variable substitution for LLM interactions.

$schema.description: Reference to this JSON Schema for IDE autocompletion

templateId.description: Unique identifier for the prompt template

name.description: Human-readable name for the prompt template

description.description: Description of what this prompt template does

template.description: The prompt template text with {{variable}} placeholders for substitution

outputSchema.description: JSON Schema defining the expected output structure from the LLM

metadata.description: Additional metadata for the prompt template

author.description: Author or team that created this template

recommendedModels.description: List of recommended LLM models for this template

useCases.description: Example use cases for this template

mcp.description: Optional MCP (Model Context Protocol) extension for runtime serving via MCP servers

variableSchema.description: Schema definition for a template variable

required.description: Whether this variable must be provided when rendering

enum.description: List of allowed values for this variable

$ref.description: Reference to an external schema definition

mcpExtension.description: MCP (Model Context Protocol) extension for exposing this template as an MCP prompt

enabled.description: Whether to expose this template via MCP prompts/list and prompts/get

name.description: MCP prompt name (lowercase with underscores). Defaults to templateId if not specified.

description.description: Description shown in MCP prompts/list. Defaults to template description if not specified.

arguments.description: Explicit MCP arguments. If not specified, auto-derived from variables.

examples.name: Sentiment Analysis Prompt
examples.template: Analyze the sentiment of the following text: {{message}}
